contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 9, 1997 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (2nd and 3rd Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Second and Third Section) 25 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-23-section
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including Appalachian Mountain Folk Song Suite. 13 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Shaun Milum, Trombone, Yeovil
1st Prize: £300.00 (Copperd trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Festival trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Midsummer trophy) 4th Prize: £40.00
March 7, 2011, 5:19 p.m. March 7, 2011, 5:20 p.m.

2 Sherborne Town Band Ian Lowes
3 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
4 Hanwell Band Michael Pegram
